serialNumber.description: The serial number of the vessel

start.description: The start date and time of the vessel's usage

end.description: The end date and time of the vessel's usage

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the IMU sensor

start.description: The start date and time of the IMU sensor's usage

model.description: The model of the IMU sensor

end.description: The end date and time of the IMU sensor's usage

atdOffsets.description: The ATD offsets used for the site

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the transducer associated with the offset

gnssAntennas.description: The gnss antennas used for the site

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the GNSS antenna

order.description: The order of the GNSS antenna

model.description: The model of the GNSS antenna

radomeSerialNumber.description: The serial number of the radome

end.description: The end date and time of the GNSS antenna's usage

gnssReceivers.description: The gnss receivers used for the site

type.description: The type of the GNSS receiver

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the GNSS receiver

start.description: The start date and time of the GNSS receiver's usage

model.description: The model of the GNSS receiver

firmwareVersion.description: The firmware version of the GNSS receiver

end.description: The end date and time of the GNSS receiver's usage

acousticTransducers.description: The acoustic transducers used for the site

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the acoustic transducer

frequency.description: The frequency of the acoustic transducer
